sales.name: Rogue
sales.description: Established in 1999, Rogue began as a small collection of classic outerwear with racing influences. Created by New York-based designer Jimmy Reilly, the brand's distinct identity, fit and technical innovation quickly garnered praise, and now its line includes woven shirts, soft comfy knits, shoes, and pants. Replete with details like fabrics specially treated to look worn, articulated elbows and custom-made hardware, they're the perfect fit for men who love being updated, edgy, and casual.

sales.name: Ingersoll
sales.description: Mark Twain, Thomas Edison, and Sir Alan Cobham all used Ingersoll watches and fell under the spell of these classic timepieces. It is said that Sir Alan Cobham used an Ingersoll watch to keep time over his 1928 flight over Africa because he trusted it over his plane's own instruments. Even Mahatma Gandhi would sit at the ashram with his Ingersoll watch propped in front of him. Join this rank of extraordinary gentleman and pick up an Ingersoll timepiece; they've been classics since 1892.

sales.name: Sonic Editions
sales.description: Sonic Editions specializes in limited-edition fine-art photographic prints of the greatest musicians, film stars, cult heroes, and cultural icons. With an unrivaled number of specially sourced iconic pictures from the world's best photographers and most renowned archives, its offering includes photographs rarely seen before. All its prints are expertly mounted and encased in handmade wooden frames.

sales.name: 360 Electrical
sales.description: Since 2005, 360 Electrical has been striving to make things better. They're dedicated to creating smarter solutions that keep pace with tech-centered lifestyles. They especially love breathing new life into products or categories that have been neglected or are just plain tired. Headquartered in Salt Lake City, Utah, 360 has sold millions of their unique, rotating electrical outlets with built-in smart ports. Whether you're super tech savvy or just plain tired of bulk, you'll love how much they simplify your space.

sales.name: Versace Ties
sales.description: As one of the leading fashion design brands worldwide, Versace is the epitome of sexy, empowering glamor as well as being the symbol of Italian luxury. Celebrities and connoisseurs alike adore the brand for its uncompromising design, its rich and ultra-sensual style, and its impeccable craftsmanship and quality.

sales.name: Distil Union
sales.description: Distil Union is a micro-collective of two industrial designers and one graphic designer who are having fun (and working hard) creating solutions to real-life problems. In their years as designers at Philips Electronics and Digital Lifestyle Outfitters, they worked on hundreds of products together, mainly Apple accessories. But design is just one teeny part of those companies… They've started our own design company that also develops and delivers the products that Distil Union wants to see on the shelves. Huzzah!

sales.name: Banksy Pillows
sales.description: Banksy is perhaps the most famous anonymous street artist known (or unknown) today. His satirical street art and subversive epigrams combine dark humor with graffiti done in a distinctive stenciling technique. Such artistic works of political and social commentary have been featured on streets, walls, and bridges of cities throughout the world.

sales.name: DrinkTanks
sales.description: DrinkTanks is committed to offering a 100% sustainable product. Not only do their stainless steel containers, bottles, growlers, keg taps, and beer gifts help reduce the amount of plastic bottles that just end up in landfills, they last for years and are completely recyclable. All products contain no BPAs, phthalates, or other harmful substances to your body, and do not leach chemicals or retain flavors, stains or odors. All of their growlers are manufactured and certified to meet FDA, CE and BPA free standards.

sales.name: SmartPlane by TobyRich
sales.description: TobyRich is a young and innovative startup headquartered in Bremen, Germany. They pride themselves on putting their hearts and souls into crafting the best smartphone gadgets and mobile wireless solutions on the market. Currently employed at TobyRich are ten bright minds, who each come from five different countries to create diverse, sophisticated technologies for the modern world.

sales.name: Bastron
sales.description: Bastron makes your tech smarter, with accessories that fit your frantic life while providing an impressive improvement on your old set of tools. You'll be impressed by all you can accomplish with the Glass Touch Smart Keyboard featured in this sale.

sales.name: FlexDex
sales.description: The story of Flexdex skateboards began in 1995 in San Diego, California. The original crew was made up of surfers, skaters, snowboarders, and motorcross riders who brought to market a unique, flexible design embraced by both novice and expert riders alike. It was this extensive groundwork and the introduction of polycarbonate technology to the line up that have continued to provide rides described as ultra-smooth, outrageously durable, and exceptionally fast.

sales.name: Vialli
sales.description: The Vialli design brand was created in 2010 and it is a polish-italian project. Designers have focused on creating a product which is stylish yet meets everyday needs. It makes modern and futuristic products, which are dominated by courageous and expressive coloring.

sales.name: Vaportini
sales.description: The Vaportini provides a revolutionary way of consuming alcohol. It is inhaled rather than swallowed. It is smooth and flavorful, the subtleties of the individual spirits are apparent. It is absorbed directly into the bloodstream and does not go through the digestive tract. This has the advantage of almost no calories; no carbs, no impurities and the effects of consuming alcohol are immediately felt, making it easier to responsibly imbibe.

sales.name: Woodwear Sunglasses
sales.description: Woodwear is based in Hermosa Beach, California where they surf, skate and enjoy the good life near the ocean. They are inspired by California Beach culture and the nature that surrounds them. Their goal is to create wearable artwork by making wooden sunglasses out of sustainable bamboo.

sales.name: Kitchen Goose
sales.description: Kitchen Goose is dedicated to making cooking and eating eggs all the better, and they've hit gold with their trademarked Golden Goose™, which uses centrifugal force to scramble your egg in shell, before it's exposed to heat. This quirky gadget recently enjoyed great popularity, with its Kickstarter project reaching nearly 500% of its original funding goal. The Goose team is now hard at work creating enough Golden Gooses™ for all — and, of course, trying to revolutionize your egg experience.

sales.name: Orange Chef
sales.description: The Orange Chef Company is making the kitchen a place of confidence and discovery. They're creating a smart ecosystem for the kitchen made up of quality products built with an emphasis on simple design, maintaining the craft of cooking, and using local and sustainable materials. They strive to give their customers the tools to understand and navigate their nutritional, culinary and spoon-licking lives. Whether you’re a cupcake baker, a kimchi pickler, a quinoa connoisseur, or a leftover-reheater—whoever you are, whatever you’re eating, Orange Chef is here to connect you to your food.

sales.name: Kim Denzler Underwear
sales.description: Kim Denzler is a Swedish brand founded by Kim Sjogren, a designer and former fashion model. Pared-down and understatedly stylish, every detail of this underwear has been engineered for absolute comfort and functionality. And there are many great details to choose from — from the split legs allowing for maximum movement, to subtly contrasting seams that add a healthy dose of style. As Kim himself likes to say: great underwear isn't rocket science. It's just good design.

Category: Mens Fashion > Clothing > Underwear > Boxer Briefs

sales.name: Vestal Watches
sales.description: Vestal Watches are watches that fine-tune style and expression for the musically inspired individual. Established in 1997, Vestal is marketed and branded through friends, musicians, artists, and athletes who are immersed within music culture. Vestal can be found in specialty stores and boutiques around the world.

sales.name: Aftershokz
sales.description: Aftershokz is the maker of the world's finest open ear, bone conduction headphones. Delivering amazing sound quality while completely bypassing your eardrums, their line of sporty, powerful earbuds are both exceptionally safe and exceptionally sleek.

sales.name: Bobbie Burns
sales.tagline: Laid-Back Kicks With a Swedish Inflence
sales.description: Bobbie Burns was founded in 2011 by Henrik Standerth and Patrik Laks, and has been churning out laid-back kicks ever since. Creating a mix of men's chukkas, sneakers, and oxfords in a fresh mix of innovative, technical, and artisanal fabrics, BB is known for mixing a punk rock and street influences without sacrificing the Swedish minimalism of their birth places.

sales.name: MTHARU
sales.description: Designer Sumer Singh Matharu is fascinated with creating robust design with industrial specifications to make them last for a lifetime. Matharu, MTHARU's creator, is most interested in using materials in their natural form. He believes in re-using, so he integrates reclaimed material where possible. This sale features the best of his innovative taste in design.

sales.name: Radius by mod-3
sales.description: Established at beginning of 2012 and based in San Jose, California, mod-3's small team consists of designers and entrepreneurs. mod-3's RADIUS case was the result of the core team's belief that everyday objects can always be designed and made better. The design of the RADIUS case is based on the design team's passion and love for minimalism and architecture. The RADIUS is an all aluminum bumper that is made to showcase the iconic iPhone without covering the original design features.

sales.name: Box Brew Kits
sales.description: HopBox — the maker of the exclusive, authentic homebrewing kits that you know and love — is rebranding itself as Box Brew Kits, and frankly, we couldn't be more excited. All of the custom details will remain — they're still handcrafted from rustic pine to be completely unique, and work flawlessly in any kitchen. But with updated recipes, new brews by the minute, and designer Michael Langone's continued dedication to building his craft, Box Brew Kits is set to take over the home brew market.

sales.name: Vertex Outdoors
sales.description: Backpacking is minimalism in action. When you're facing miles of challenging terrain and days away from civilization, each item in your pack must be lightweight, reliable, and easy to use. After all, you should be focused on experiencing the sites around you, not worrying about whether your gear will function throughout your hike! Vertex developed the VLS series ultralight stoves to offer the best combination of performance, reliability, minimum weight and pack volume.

sales.name: Marmont Hill
sales.tagline: Brushed Aluminum and Natural Wood Maps
sales.description: Marmont Hill is a collective of artists that create original works of art that are inspired by people, places and things. Each limited edition piece is handcraft in California and printed on a variety of materials such as aluminum, canvas, mirrors, and reclaimed woods. This sale is a curated TouchOfModern collection of large map art.

sales.name: Ines Kouidis
sales.description: The complex art of Ines Kouidis is born from a fascination with movie stars, rock stars, pop idols, and icons. Constructing ornate collages out of old newspapers, glossy magazines, posters and found paper, this array of masterful prints are sure to add pop-culture inflected focal point to any space.

sales.name: SK Telecom
sales.description: In the natural world, all elements hold their forms and shapes for a reason. This purpose-driven design is the inspiration behind SK Telecom's ideals. Their projects pare electronic elements down to the essentials; minimal design, and every last detail filled with function.

sales.name: A\Studio
sales.description: A\Studio is the design company created by designer André Simón. Based in Spain, their small atelier specializes in designs that center around the sleek, the modern, and the fun. Picking up numerous design awards and recognitions along the way, A\Studio's roster of fine furnishings is sure to add the perfect touch to your soon-to-be-ideal home.

sales.name: Zutoq
sales.description: Zutoq makes the kind of street-ready, laid-back basics that stylish lounging enthusiasts dream of. Created to fuse fashion and comfort, its founders had a vision of making super comfortable sweatshirts and joggers while pushing the envelope of edge and detail. In 2014 the brand launched its first line, which sold out in just two weeks. Made in terry and fleece, and replete with thoughtful detailing like contrast construction, reinforced seats, and zippered pockets, these stylish essentials will take you wherever you need to go, whether it's the gym or the next big music festival.

sales.name: Sleek Electric Fireplaces
sales.description: This sleek range of electric fireplaces by Northwest and Even Glow will change your space for the better. Allowing you to stay cozy and warm while enjoying a beautiful fire, but without introducing the dangers of a real fireplace, they're the ultimate way to set the mood. And, decked out with features like flame brightness and heat adjustability, you're not only able to set the mood — you're able to adjust it whenever the urge strikes you.

sales.name: Perruzo
sales.description: If you're in need of a useful everyday wardrobe-saver, look no further than Perruzo's immensely versatile collection of chinos and fashionable jeans. Done in a mix of luxe denim, leather and twill, with timeless colorways and a flattering fit, they'll complete your outfit whether you're headed to work or to the movies.

sales.name: Traveler's Choice
sales.description: Prep for your next adventure with Traveler's Choice Luggage. With a selection of hardside cases, carry-on pieces, duffels, and three-piece sets, this travel brand has a luxurious assortment of functional pieces that will roll along with your every move. Ditch your raggedy old suitcase and head to First Class with a premium TCL piece.

sales.name: ASPECD
sales.description: A combination of traditional British styling with Japanese fabrication and detailing, ASPECD was created to push shirting to a higher standard. With inspired designs, proper fits, and an unparalleled focus on correct sizing for everyone, these button-ups capture the aesthetic of a versatile, modern life. You can feel the fineness in the way these shirt sit on the body; and, made with special "in-between" sizes for those that fall somewhere between small, medium, and large, they're well worth filling your closet with.

sales.name: HF Barcelona
sales.description: HF Barcelona is behind this collection of innovative, creative and functional accessories designed entirely for the cigar smoker. Designed in Barcelona, their city of origin, and manufactured with over 30 years of experience in the sector, HF Barcelona creates articles with a timeless design and a marked character, which honors their history and tradition. HfBarcelona is behind an entirely new way of understanding smoking accessories.

sales.name: Katz Knives
sales.description: Under the leadership of Keith Derkatz, Katz Knives has been making its own brand of fixed, folding, survival, and pocket knives since 1991. In addition to an array of sleek, sporting designs, Katz uses its own proprietary XT80 and XT70 Stainless Steel, which tests at 56-59 on the Rockwell “C” scale, and is a particularly resilient blend that retains an edge for a lifetime. All the knives are designed by Keith personally, and he makes it a point to only release knives that are at the apex of originality. In short: you'll love these luxury blades.

sales.name: Teamm8
sales.description: Teamm8 Collections is a new Australian sportswear label that draws inspiration from quintessential sporting values — team spirit, determination, strength, and masculinity. With this line, they combine playful, bold, and bright colors with updated designs in luxurious fabrics, all to showcase their unparalleled skill with underwear, swimwear, and sportswear.

Category: Mens Fashion > Clothing > T Shirts, Tees

sales.name: Sunjack
sales.description: Sunjack seeks to provide portable energy independence to people around the globe. From powering first-world luxuries to basic living essentials, they recognize the power in having our own, renewable energy source that is engineered to perform, crafted to last, and designed to make life better.

sales.name: Messerstahl
sales.description: The Messerstahl Collection is the result of the very best in research, quality, and design. Hand forged, full tang construction from the finest french carbon stainless steel. Featuring Messerstahl’s patented "Textra-Grip" handles, a slip resistant finish that miraculously improves the user's grip when wet. Messerstahl’s ultra modern acrylic blocks are something of the future, making them compatible with any kitchen design. Backed by a 100% Lifetime Guarantee, Messersathl Cutlery will be the last set of knives you will ever buy.

sales.name: YOHANN
sales.description: The YOHANN stand will have you rethinking what it means to make an Apple accessory. These handmade treasures are produced sustainably with a shockingly low footprint, boast an incredible style, and provide three different angles for vertical and horizontal orientation. Individually made to be stable, and to show off their custom finishes or utterly unique wood grain, these stands and sound enhancers are for those who treat their tablets not only as functional essentials, but as objects of beauty.

sales.name: Mazzuoli Ducati
sales.description: The Officina Museo Ducati collection is a line of writing instruments completely handcrafted in Florence, Italy. Every pen is sculpted from a solid piece of aluminum that is shaped and milled into an original object with functional characteristics.

sales.name: Palomar
sales.description: Palomar is known for its unusual designs and innovative idea-generation. As a brand, Palomar is particularly interested in the search for new forms and the new application of instruments for seeing/ looking at the world. This sale features accessories for travel junkies — think urban maps and journey-recording pins. The world is your oyster with these deluxe, international products.

Category: Home > Home Accents & Décor > Books > Non-Fiction

sales.name: Le Club Swimwear
sales.description: From the lush beaches of Miami and the spirited streets of Ocean Drive, Le Club is a swimwear line inspired by the vibrant city and its people. Le Club thinks of each swimsuit as a canvas, combining bright, lush colors and a streamlined form with enough detailing to get you through any beachside situation. Le Club brings the fun to the beach in the most elegant way possible.

sales.name: d.brand
sales.description: If you love designer duds, but are looking for a brand that's more underground — and, subsequently, less flashy and ubiquitous — look no further than d.brand. With an exclusive distribution catered to hip boutiques in up-and-coming New York and L.A. neighborhoods, these clothes are anything but easy to track down. And that's a wonderful thing: designed and produced in-house with the utmost attention paid to detailing, fit, and fabrication, there are no compromises to be found.

Category: Mens Fashion > Clothing > T Shirts, Tees

sales.name: Roomsafari
sales.description: Founded in 2001, Roomsafari is a Berlin-based company that creates simple and refined home accessories, lamps, and furniture for a relaxed lifestyle. With a range of innovative products, they have received numerous design awards. They strive to bring into the world only smart, pure design solutions.

Category: Home > Home Accents & Décor > Lighting > Lamps

sales.name: SWEAR
sales.description: SWEAR was founded in 2001 by young entrepreneur José Neves and has become one of the most ubiquitous and iconic footwear brands from London. Synonymous with the casual hybrid shoe, its design is all about the playfulness of silhouettes, materials and craftsmanship, and combining traditional shapes with modern detailing. Neves' footwear is a bold, minimal statement, and a favorite of bands like the The Strokes, White Stripes and The Hives.

sales.name: The HomePort Collections
sales.description: The HomePort Collection's lamps blend modern function with classic industrial style. With their included Edison bulbs, these dome and cage designs add a warm touch to any bedroom, living room, or home office. Whether you're outfitting an industrial space or a clean minimal loft, these lamps are the perfect finishing touch.

Category: Home > Home Accents & Décor > Lighting > Lamps

sales.name: SureFire
sales.description: Since their founding over 35 years ago, SureFire has proudly been a U.S. manufacturer, and throughout their history their best-in-class illumination tools have been designed, machined, tested, and assembled the American way. They lead the way in innovative products for accomplishing any mission, with input from special ops groups, elite law enforcement, hardcore outdoorsmen, EMTs, and other gear-toting survivors.

sales.name: IOOI
sales.description: Radical, simple and elegant, the design of IOOI turns the world of hookahs upside down. Sophisticated modern materials, like anodized aluminum, polished brass and crystal clear glass comprise this outstanding sculpture, presented in a minimalistic and extraordinary design.

underperforming_sales.name: RSW
underperforming_sales.description: RSW, from Rama Watch, imposes a futuristic vision within the watch industry. One of the top contemporary brand in the watch industry today, its atypical style quickly convinced and enriched a market saturated with industrialized products, becoming one of the first brands to enter to the pantheon of pioneers of the 21st century. RSW is alive and liberated in phase with the various forms of contemporary artistic expressions.

underperforming_sales.name: Stansborough
underperforming_sales.description: Stansborough is devoted to making timeless, environmentally friendly heirloom textiles. Their unique fabric blends use the rarest wools from New Zealand and traditional 1890s looms to weave stunning collections of exquisite pieces. Pure and natural in every way, their woven collections have been featured in blockbuster movies and interior design magazines alike, with each piece being individually finished for maximum impact. Drape your home in these time-honored pieces and know that you're doing good for yourself and the world.

underperforming_sales.name: Gerard De Hoop
underperforming_sales.description: Gerard De Hoop is a independent interior designer and architect who makes mind-bending pieces with Scandinavian roots. His unique designs deftly combine pared-down forms, elements of surprise, and utter versatility. While basic geometric shapes are the basis of his work, he always explores the boundaries of what is possible seeking out a tension that will shine in any space. Case in point: these innovative Frames, bookshelves and room dividers whose incredible, floating design makes them not only conversation starters, but a luxurious taste-makers.

underperforming_sales.name: Baume & Mercier
underperforming_sales.description: Baume et Mercier enjoys international recognition and is the seventh oldest Swiss watchmaking brand. Baume et Mercier, a family saga, has been making its mark on watchmaking history since its inception. They are committed to perpetuating this heritage and continuing to pass down this know-how to future generations.

underperforming_sales.name: Members Only
underperforming_sales.description: One of the most unique, classic, and American designs in menswear history, Members Only is synonymous with high-end vintage stores and thrift store finds. But since making the defining jacket of the 80’s —the brand has been working steadily to deliver a range of preppy classics with updated functions and silhouettes for the more discerning customer. Timeless and modern, these Members Only polos will get you through the weekend in a style you can really get behind, whether you're a baby boomer or a millennial.

underperforming_sales.name: Haydanhuya
underperforming_sales.description: Design is there for the sole purpose of serving function, that is, to contribute to the effectiveness of the use of the product and the satisfaction of the person using it. That is the philosophy behind Haydanhuya's handcrafted wood designs.

underperforming_sales.name: Chanman
underperforming_sales.description: Chanman was born from a desire to stand out from the crowd. This group of Aussie designers knows that it's the small things that can add flare and style to an outfit — especially in the realm of menswear. So they set out to make the best accessories possible, adding thoughtful twists and incorporating classic high style into everything they do.

ending_sales.name: Fiyta
ending_sales.description: Fiyta is an international watch brand which was founded in 1987 and specializes in watch design, manufacturing and marketing. Owing to its consummate watch making craftsmanship, Fiyta has provided space watches for China's astronauts in the manned spaceflight program since 2003, and Extreme models have been a staple of professional motorcyclists' style.

ending_sales.name: Local Motors
ending_sales.description: With a goal of making transportation more sustainable globally by empowering maker profitability, defending and advancing the environment, and improving safety and well-being, Local Motors has developed its own global co-creation community, made up of enthusiasts, hobbyist innovators and professionals. Their builds come straight from the hard work and daydreams of speed demons as passionate as you are.

ending_sales.name: Witti Design
ending_sales.description: Passionate about product design, Witti Design delivers elegant lifestyle products for the Internet era. They work with designers and artists to craft unique products with a subtle presence. Inspired by geometric shapes, minimal design is their goal, creating stunning simplicity in the user experience.

ending_sales.name: Breo
ending_sales.tagline: The Art of Massage Goes Electronic
ending_sales.description: All Breo massagers are based on the traditional channel massage theory of Chinese medicine, as well as modern biomagnetism theory. The company is committed to promoting health and wellness. Through 16 years of development, the company has become a leading brand in the industry of portable healthcare products.

ending_sales.name: NOIZY Brand
ending_sales.description: NOIZY Brands is proud to introduce Wireless NOIZY Kameleon Earbuds. They are a performance lifestyle stereo Bluetooth audio Brand that delivers a unique combination of high quality audio performance, cutting-edge features, and a stylish aesthetic for athletes and fitness enthusiasts. Using Bluetooth 4.0 technology, NOIZY Kameleon allows you to connect up to 2 devices at the same time (phone, tablet and laptop). It is truly designed to move.

ending_sales.name: Silver Arrows Project
ending_sales.description: Experience the most celebrated moments in automobile history as they unfold right before your eyes in breathtaking scale. These large format prints provide detail that could never have been captured with the photographic technology of the time. Using a combination of original photography with the most advanced 3D graphics, the designers and artists at Silver Arrows Project have brought the legendary silver cars of Mercedes-Benz and Auto Union — along with other famous brands — back to life. Staging complete recreations with actors, costumes and props, these large-scale prints will complete any auto-enthusiast's art collection.

ending_sales.name: Clae
ending_sales.description: Since the launch of Clae back in 2001, the brand has been featured in the best men's magazines around the globe, and has introduced collaborations with a number of high-profile movers and shakers including Steven Alan. Clae combines the casual silhouettes and the supreme comfort of athletic shoes with the high style of designer kicks, creating hybrids that few can beat. Clae's designer, Sung Choi, names his footwear after inspirational and iconic guys throughout the ages — adding a touch of history to every fashionable step.

ending_sales.name: Lite Source
ending_sales.description: These contemporary lamps from Lite Source are the ideal pieces to illuminate any space in your home in an understated yet stylish manner. And considering this sale features LED lighting, you will save much more energy than you would with lamps that use traditional light sources. Offering a variety of modern designs, these are the perfect accessories to update your life.

Category: Home > Home Accents & Décor > Lighting > Lamps

ending_sales.name: Maceoo
ending_sales.description: For the French San Diegan brand, Maceoo, fashion is more than just a statement. Their collection is a completely unique, a high-end blend of quality fabrics, refined detailing, and a commitment to tailoring. Allowing men from across the globe to dress their best in any situation, these designer shirts, fashion blazers, and polos will get you through the week with style.

ending_sales.name: Yamamoto
ending_sales.description: Established in the back streets of Akihabara, Tokyo, Yamamoto Industries has been a leading distributor of exclusive electronic accessories in Japan. Founded in 1972 on the principle of globalizing Japanese electronics, Yamamoto Industries has since been at the forefront of innovation and exclusive products.

ending_sales.name: Calvin Klein Rugs
ending_sales.description: Known for sleek detailing and impeccable taste, Calvin Klein's home offerings are for the truly tasteful. Concentrating on streamlined neutrals, this collection of fine rugs are sheared, crafted, and tufted to perfection.

ending_sales.name: DamnDog
ending_sales.description: DamnDog Bags is dedicated to making bags that — like your beloved pet — will follow you wherever you go, and bring you joy in the process. Made of the finest materials, and outfitted with special detailing you won't find elsewhere — from hidden passport pockets to integrated water bottle holsters — these individually handcrafted treasures are the tough, durable, and handsome everyday cary-alls you've been looking for.

ending_sales.name: SteamVita
ending_sales.description: SteamVita was developed by two U.S. Veterans, John Brier and Jack Mosher, to provide healthy, delicious steamed meals wherever there are heat and water sources. These stainless steel pieces are truly gourmet with tiered layers and food chambers for preserving the very best nutritional value in your cooking sessions.

ending_sales.name: Richer Poorer
ending_sales.description: Richer Poorer was built on a simple idea. To make everyday products better than themselves. They found that it takes a unique perspective and a willingness to go down a path less traveled. To build from the inside out. They have followed that path ever since. Their collections begin with the forgotten finds uncovered in thrift stores, pictures of a family road trip taken long ago, the texture of a knitted sweater, and the yearning for something new. Richer Poorer Socks translate inspirations from the past into tangible designs that are relatable today.

ending_sales.name: Hart Schaffner Marx
ending_sales.description: The Hart Schaffner Marx story is an American story spanning well over a century. In 1887, two immigrant brothers, Harry and Max Hart, scraped together enough money to open up a men's clothier in Chicago. Through their tireless work, savvy innovation — they were the first to introduce suits tailored for different body types, zipped trousers and lightweight wool suits — the brothers grew their company into one of the largest suits manufacturers in the world. HSM continues in that tradition today, giving well-dressed men of conviction the style and grace they demand.

ending_sales.name: Papi Underwear
ending_sales.description: Papi underwear is intended for handsome, modern men with dynamic, fun-loving lifestyles. These Brazilian briefs offer support, comfort and style for traveling, jetsetting and partying while blending seamlessly with your look. These 2-pack sets are machine washable and thoroughly stylish for your skivvy collection.

ending_sales.name: Patrona
ending_sales.description: Your life is fast paced and your to-do list spills over; you're busy with overseas travel, cross country adventures, and morning motorcycle commutes. You never know when you're going to need a freshly pressed dress shirt, and traditional folding just doesn't cut it. The Shirt Shuttle protects your shirt inside a crush-proof water-resistant case with rounded corners that prevent creases from folding. Scratch dry cleaning off your to-do list and look immaculately put together, airplane be damned.

ending_sales.name: Neptunia Knives
ending_sales.description: Neptunia Knives were imagined and designed with simplicity as a guideline. This pocket knife was born from the special fondness of its designer for the history of the Dorry — a small, shallow-draft boat from the Grand Banks of Newfoundland where extraordinary northern adventures were lived by ordinary men. These knives are remarkably unique for collectors and sea enthusiasts.

ending_sales.name: LuminoGlow
ending_sales.description: Inspiration for this daring new line of luminescent lingerie arose out of the need for something exciting and gorgeous to wear in the bedroom. The inspiration involved lots of champagne and fabulous friends with outrageous ideas, who finally came up with something fun, and yet incredibly feminine and sensual. Lingerie that says “adore me, want me," even in the dark.

Category: Womens Fashion > Clothing > Intimates, Lingerie, Shapewear > Underwear
Womens Fashion > Clothing > Intimates, Lingerie, Shapewear > Other

ending_sales.name: Tsunami Glassworks
ending_sales.description: Tsunami designs are lush, blown glass artworks that stand at the curious intersection between nature, science, and artful technique. These free blown glass pieces were inspired by the ocean, the human body, and the world around with clean, versatile lines. Place these beautiful pieces on your garden dining room table or in the comfort of your study for an elevated detail.

Category: Home > Home Accents & Décor > Glass, Metal, Stone Pieces

ending_sales.name: Psyberia
ending_sales.description: At Psyberia, they don't believe in bad weather — only in inappropriate gear. Their design team is dedicated to bringing unique style to highly technical, all weather clothing, ensuring they cater to the needs of fellow outdoor crusaders and urban trekkers. For the individuals drawn to the extreme, Psyberia has made a line that offers the supreme protection, spot on design, a perfect fit commensurate with the adventurous life.

Category: Mens Fashion > Clothing > T Shirts, Tees
Mens Fashion > Clothing > Outerwear > Lightweight & Rain

ending_sales.name: Knork Flatware
ending_sales.description: Knork Flatware was designed as a line of serving utensils with gorgeous form and balance, but also extended function. Founded by Michael D. Miller, the company is innovative in its design strategy. Collectively, the studio refines the ordinary with thoughtful consideration for today's on-the-move type lifestyles. The Knork Flatware collection seeks to enhance your dining experience by integrating the functionality of a knife into almost every piece of kitchenware.

ending_sales.name: Samuel Hubbard
ending_sales.description: Building on a tradition that goes back nearly 85 years, Samuel Hubbard offers shoes of the very highest quality, using the finest leathers from around the world. Fit and comfort are tantamount to their designs — this is a brand absolutely committed to making your day-to-day lace-up experience better. And, as a four-generation shoemaking family with decades-old ties, they work with the finest shoemakers on earth — and it shows.

ending_sales.name: Embrace
ending_sales.description: Have you had enough of tacky, cheap-looking sex toys? That's precisely why Embrace Adult Toys are designed with the utmost quality, comfort, and simplicity in mind. This collection of toys brings it back to the basics to offer you the most pleasurable experience possible.

ending_sales.name: 1DEA.me
ending_sales.description: 1DEA is a young, Ukrainian company which creates original products attuned to how you live your life. With a specialty in home décor, their team of designers love to ideate and create handsome and beautiful products that are the first — or the best — of their kind. Case in point: these Scratch Foil World Maps, which over time become a rich and bright tapestry of all the places you've traveled.

ending_sales.name: Rolo Travel Bag
ending_sales.description: The Rolo Travel Bag makes it easy to stay organized while traveling, no matter how you get to where you're going. Because all of your clothes roll up into a manageable shape and size, this bag is great for motorcycle trips and camping. Never agin will you have to hassle with boxy suitcases with this innovative bag.

ending_sales.name: Agustav
ending_sales.description: Agustav is based in Copenhagen and creates minimalist "floating" nightstands and bookshelves for your space. These rich wood pieces help to organize your favorite editions and daily essentials with playful, performative style. Show off your goods with these dreamy shelves that are ready-to-hang.
